description:
Uchiha Obito was a chuunin-level shinobi from Konohagakure`s Uchiha clan and a member of Team Minato, together with http://anidb.net/ch31907 [Hatake Kakashi] and http://anidb.net/ch10927 [Nohara Rin], led by http://anidb.net/ch8866 [Namikaze Minato].
After his apparent death during the Third Shinobi World War, Obito took up the aliases Tobi and Uchiha Madara and became an international criminal responsible for various crimes, including the Nine-Tails` attack on Konoha, after he was saved and taken care of by the believed to be dead http://anidb.net/ch8623 [Uchiha Madara]. He eventually became one of the leaders of Akatsuki.
name: Uchiha Obito
